references.paper_title: Stochastic interpolants: A unifying framework for flows and diffusions
references.reason: This paper provides a foundational framework for understanding flows and diffusions, which are central to the image-to-video generation methods discussed in the paper.

references.paper_title: Latent-shift: Latent diffusion with temporal shift for efficient text-to-video generation
references.reason: This paper presents a novel approach for text-to-video generation using latent diffusion models and temporal shifts, which addresses the challenges of generating coherent and realistic video sequences.

references.paper_title: Stable video diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets
references.reason: This paper explores scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets, which is crucial for training high-quality and efficient image-to-video generation models.

references.paper_title: Align your latents: High-resolution video synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces a technique for high-resolution video synthesis using latent diffusion models, addressing the limitations of previous approaches in generating high-quality video.

references.paper_title: Improving image generation with better captions
references.reason: This paper explores the improvement of image generation models by using better captions, which is highly relevant to image-to-video generation as it directly impacts the textual description of the video content.
